p: Analysis of results was done using Statistical Package for Social Sciences (SPSS) software version 21. All results obtained were expressed as mean Â± standard error of mean (SEM) of responses. The statistical significance was determined by using One-way Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) followed by a Tukey post hoc test to compare variations among groups and the results were considered significant at p < 0.05. The analyzed data were then presented using tables and graphs where necessary.
